data.fullContent: Jane Fonda (born December 21, 1937) is an American actress, writer, political activist and former fashion model. She is the daughter of Henry Fonda, who was an actor. She is the sister of Peter Fonda and aunt of Bridget Fonda - both of whom are actors. She has won two Academy Awards for her acting.
data.answer: 简·方达(生于1937年12月21日)是美国女演员、作家、政治活动家和前时装模特。她是演员亨利·方达的女儿。她是彼得·方达的妹妹和布里吉特·方达的姨妈，两人都是演员。她曾两次获得奥斯卡金像奖。
